search_results.title: Sam Short, Author at Journal of the American Revolution
search_results.snippet: Sam Short is an Instructor of History with Motlow State Community College in Smyrna, Tennessee. Sam started teaching with Motlow in 2022.

search_results.title: Sam Short
search_results.snippet: Sam Short is an Instructor of History with Motlow State Community College in Smyrna, Tennessee.

search_results.title: Sam Short: books, biography, latest update
search_results.snippet: Sam Short loves writing, narrowboats, and laughing. It's his dream to one day be able to leave land behind and live on the canals in a narrowboat of his own.
